mapper.insert: insert into tt_member(member_id, login_id, login_pwd, username, nickname, phone, email, gender, birth, is_manager, token, acc_amount, membership_id) values(MEMBER_SEQ.nextval,#{login_id},#{login_pwd},#{username},#{nickname},#{phone},#{email}, #{gender},#{birth},0,null,0,'뚜벅이')
mapper.update: UPDATE tt_member SET login_pwd = #{login_pwd}, nickname = #{nickname}, phone = #{phone} WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: select * from tt_member where login_id like '%' || #{word} || '%' or username like '%' || #{word} || '%' or nickname like '%' || #{word} || '%'
